@@ -1,33 +1,43 @@
-import React from 'react';
-import { Box, Grid, Card, CardContent, Typography, Avatar } from '@mui/material';
+import React from "react";
+import {
+  Box,
+  Grid,
+  Card,
+  CardContent,
+  Typography,
+  Avatar,
+} from "@mui/material";
 
 export default function Testimonials() {
   const testimonials = [
     {
       id: 1,
       name: "b.h.",
-      feedback: "I love your site and this project. It is absolutely amazing! It's perfectly designed for my brain. I can dive into my field of research and new fields within minutes.",
+      feedback:
+        "I love your site and this project. It is absolutely amazing! It's perfectly designed for my brain. I can dive into my field of research and new fields within minutes.",
       avatarUrl: "path_to_avatar_image",
     },
     {
       id: 2,
       name: "Sina Pinter",
-      feedback: "I recently learned about @ConnectedPapers and it is amazing! It makes literature searches so easy! You can really easily find papers related to your research topic and directly read the abstracts. so helpful! I love science twitter!",
+      feedback:
+        "I recently learned about @ConnectedPapers and it is amazing! It makes literature searches so easy! You can really easily find papers related to your research topic and directly read the abstracts. so helpful! I love science twitter!",
       avatarUrl: "path_to_avatar_image",
       likedCount: 9,
     },
     {
       id: 3,
       name: "Livia Terenzi Alfonsi",
-      feedback: "Mind blowing discovery: @ConnectedPapers !! Very helpful tool to navigate the ocean of academic publications we live in. Seems perfect if you are starting a lit review #EconTwitter",
+      feedback:
+        "Mind blowing discovery: @ConnectedPapers !! Very helpful tool to navigate the ocean of academic publications we live in. Seems perfect if you are starting a lit review #EconTwitter",
       avatarUrl: "path_to_avatar_image",
     },
     // 更多用户反馈...
   ];
 
   return (
-    <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1, maxWidth: 1200, mx: 'auto', p: 4 }}>
+    <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1, maxWidth: 1200, mx: "auto", p: 4 }}>
       <Typography variant="h4" component="h1" gutterBottom>
         We grow by word of mouth
       </Typography>
       <Grid container spacing={4}>
@@ -39,10 +49,14 @@
                   <Grid item>
                     <Avatar src={testimonial.avatarUrl} />
                   </Grid>
                   <Grid item xs>
-                    <Typography variant="subtitle1" component="h2">{testimonial.name}</Typography>
-                    <Typography variant="body2">{testimonial.feedback}</Typography>
+                    <Typography variant="subtitle1" component="h2">
+                      {testimonial.name}
+                    </Typography>
+                    <Typography variant="body2">
+                      {testimonial.feedback}
+                    </Typography>
                     {testimonial.likedCount && (
                       <Typography variant="body2" color="textSecondary">
                         ❤️ {testimonial.likedCount}
                       </Typography>
@@ -56,6 +70,4 @@
       </Grid>
     </Box>
   );
 }
-
-export Testimonials;
\ No newline at end of file

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -35,32 +35,32 @@
     // 更多用户反馈...
   ];
 
   return (
-    <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1, maxWidth: 1200, mx: "auto", p: 4 }}>
+    <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1, maxWidth: 1200, mx: 'auto', p: 4 }}>
       <Grid container spacing={4}>
         {testimonials.map((testimonial) => (
           <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4} key={testimonial.id}>
             <Card>
               <CardContent>
-                <Grid container spacing={2} alignItems="center">
+                <Grid container spacing={2}>
                   <Grid item>
-                    <Avatar src={testimonial.avatarUrl} />
+                    <Avatar src={testimonial.avatarUrl} alt={testimonial.name} />
                   </Grid>
                   <Grid item xs>
-                    <Typography variant="subtitle1" component="h2">
+                    <Typography variant="subtitle1" component="div">
                       {testimonial.name}
                     </Typography>
-                    <Typography variant="body2">
-                      {testimonial.feedback}
-                    </Typography>
                     {testimonial.likedCount && (
                       <Typography variant="body2" color="textSecondary">
                         ❤️ {testimonial.likedCount}
                       </Typography>
                     )}
                   </Grid>
                 </Grid>
+                <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
+                  {testimonial.feedback}
+                </Typography>
               </CardContent>
             </Card>
           </Grid>
         ))}
